lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone and welcome back to Critical Role. I know we missed you guys last week. We had crazy E3 coverage and the stream was fantastic in getting all that to you, and to me because I couldn't be there. So thank you to the stream team for making all of that happen last week. But we return, nevertheless, to the wondrous realm of Exandria, and the adventures that happen in this wonderful world of Critical Role. It's been a week. I'm a little crazed right now. So be prepared for crazed Mercer today.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, crazed Mercer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations! You're going to win a signed Player's Handbook and a signed cast photo so congrats to you. And we'll be giving those away for every 50 subscribers that we get throughout the show tonight. So remember in order to be part of these giveaways you have to be active in the chatroom. So every 50 subscribers, at 3,750 will be our next one and every 50 thereafter. So we'll be giving away signed Player's Handbooks and signed photos of the cast. Also, Facebook initiative that we're putting out there now. For all you guys out there who could, go to the-- Hi there Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) If you have an opportunity, go to the Geek and Sundry Facebook Page, facebook.com/geekandsundry, and share on there both #CriticalRole and a reason why you think people should watch the show. And we will be doing a giveaway for all the folks that do that, and that'll include a signed Player's Handbook, a signed photo, and this fantastic D&D Attack Wing Green Dragon Expansion Pack, which is just a cool looking mini in general.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well too bad. They're going to get it. You guys. One of you magical people are going to get this. So go to the Facebook of Geek and Sundry, share your best reasoning to the world on there why people should check us out and maybe win that, which would be cool. Also, as a heads up, let's see, we have a new shirt up! I'm sure you've seen a fantastic new Critical Role shirt. It's only a two-week limited run again. It's designed by one of our awesome fans, Matt Abernathy. Well done and thank you! (cheering)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Matt Abernathy! Did I say it right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that just went up. It has our little awesome 8-bit--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a time limit on those, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two weeks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two weeks?! You mean the people out there have only two weeks to get this t-shirt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you tell me this. Is it made of fine material? Is it a handcrafted t-shirt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The finest. If there were a t-shirt to gird your loins with, this is the one to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You heard the man. The two weeks is ticking now. Slightly less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But for the next 24 hours, anyone who downloads the game and puts in the promo code "Critical Role" will get a free champion that I voiced. An awesome tank fellow who is a lot of fun, so go check that out and get a free tank. And also for every ten subs we have ten key giveaways for the game. I think it is upwards close to $100 worth in game giveaway material and free money and stuff in the actual app itself. So every ten subscribers we'll be putting out a special key to that winner for use in the Soul Hunters game, so check that out! Good times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Marisha. Say thank you for that thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you to whomever got us this amazing super cool looking bottle of scotch!

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that's magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. Check that out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's Taurez.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Taurez Brandy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Wait, there was a card on the box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was a card on the box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that would be over there somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We sort of wanted it now, so we jumped the gun. I blame Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where's the card and the box?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I threw the card on the floor and took the scotch.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Okay, you guys. There was a card with stuff on there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! It's-- sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you don't mind, go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Hi, Geek and Sundry Crew! So while this package is actually mainly for the Critical Role "cast, I hope that they share it with you guys, too!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's not going to happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I guess that means these guys. "It's a small way of thanking you for all your hard work "for bringing us Critical Role every week and making my life a bit more bearable. I would so "appreciate holding off on giving this to the cast until the entire party is there--" Sorry Liam. "I "should've also sent you a note for the cast, through Twitch to go along with the package and it "would be amazing if you could ensure that they get it along with the package. Keep being awesome! Prometheus Theus."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Prometheus Theus!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, that's why you read the card before you open the box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Prometheus!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you, Prometheus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's Taliesin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin will be here shortly, he's running a little behind. Yeah, the problem with having this at 7PM on a Thursday in Los Angeles is that depending on where you're coming from, you may not get here by 7PM. But he'll be here shortly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, yeah, Taliesin's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you! That's amazing. And whenever that is done, that bottle is going to be repurposed for some sort of potion. It's happening.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, we could make it a candle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. Whoa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley makes awesome candles out of bottles.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well you just put the lighter fluid and a rope--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we're doing that, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That lives now as an alcoholic container, but will eventually become an awesome on-set candle. So thank you so much Prometheus, that's amazing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, thank you Prometheus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also we have a couple other gifts to give out. They weren't here last week so we couldn't give them away yet, but we have a couple of gifts over there for I believe Laura and Travis, or more specifically Vex and Grog...

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We need to wait until the end of the show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To give those away?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We have a ton of stuff to give you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? Are we waiting for the end?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then let's wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, we have a lot of presents to give you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well then, we shall wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi Liam! We miss you so much!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. I wish I was there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi. How's New York?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Muggy and hot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need better speakers.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are you in a Broadway play?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is in a Broadway play.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are you seeing Grease? Is that what's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Seriously...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Travis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So we're getting better speakers for Liam here, but he'll be up for joining us via Skype, and Taliesin will be here shortly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. What do we got to do? Should we play the game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think we're going to jump in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Everyone! Settle! Settle! Let's play the game!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we're going to get a speaker set up for Liam, but nevertheless we shall hop in here and start playing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's chaos today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. And I would like to recommend also that we try to prevent cross-talk, so be aware.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: (sing) Cross-talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, supposedly, is the most well known, holiest, and oldest place of Kima's order of worship, of the Great Platinum dragon Bahamut, of which she's a paladin, and supposedly they have a facility or means of sealing it away. So it was decided that they would send away for a holy container that could contain this evil without any worry of corruption or escape, carry it then, via skyship, over the ocean to the distant land of Othanzia, to Vasselheim, the capital city, and seal it away. After which, they went on a shopping spree to Gilmore's Glorious Goods. Met everyone's favorite mage, magic creator extraordinaire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's right! I want some stuff. Give me stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys have to figure out who gets what, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we have to do this quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So bringing us back now, you've completed your purchases, now as a party decide how to disseminate the items you've purchased. And once you guys are ready, we'll take it from there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, how many items do we have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I believe Pike is holding onto the sword, correct?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I also have a Pearl of Power, which is up for grabs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, what is that. Let me see, let me see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm holding on to a Ring of Protection plus two, and a Belt of Dwarvenkind. Hello Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, hello.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hello, Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good of you to join us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, how was your flight?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: An airplane?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The flight was-- it was slightly shorter than the drive here. Hi.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds about right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This looks good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please! Look what we got. This is a gift from-- what's his--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! What's-his-butt has something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (high-pitched) It's really good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's brandy! It's really good brandy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax has something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex. He's Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding, I'm Vex (cackles).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a Ring of Protection plus two, and a Belt of Dwarven-

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that? What does that do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It gives you a plus two bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I also have the Belt of Dwarvenkind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you say the most amazing thing about it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Belt of Dwarvenkind?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you guys remember this? It gives you a plus two to your constitution modifier. You have advantage on charisma/persuasion checks with dwarves... and you have a 50% chance, each day at dawn, of growing a full beard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I. Know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you are incapable of grow-- oh, that's right, because you guys tuned out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, we weren't here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We realized this at the end of the stream. At the top of the day, you have a 50% chance each day at dawn of growing a full, thick beard if you are capable of growing one, or a visibly thicker beard if you already have one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, Tiberius is the only one that couldn't grow a beard right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: technically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ladies could get some stank beards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can the ladies grow a beard?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could, why not?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, if our hormones were a little different--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I've seen some nasty she-beards out there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can find them a nice lady to date. I think it would work out pretty well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And if you aren't a dwarf, on top of this, you gain the following additional benefits while wearing this belt. You have advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance against poison damage, darkvision up to 60 feet. You can speak, read and write Dwarvish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got one, too. I got the Manual of Quickness of Action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one, you should keep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys have a problem if I keep the Pearl of Power?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It lets you use another third spell slot, 3rd-level spell. And I figure you guys all have better spells than 3rd-level, but I only have up to 3rd-level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it just gives you one more 3rd-level spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of my most powerful spell, which is my 3rd-level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's just fine with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they usually do a lot of damage with the 3rd-level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine with me, I generally have enough spell slots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got that Ring of Protection. Or you can have the beardy thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So yes, we also got the Coldsnap Leather Armor, plus two, which I was originally thinking for myself, but then I realized I actually have decent leather armor that gives me spell advantage, so I'm good on leather armor.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I could stand to wear it. I have no torso armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought-- are you sure sorcerers can wear it? I thought they could wear robes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cloth and leather. I mean, I just...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorcerers can wear no armor. You are wrong.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can wear no armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have this thing that somebody can use.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, I would just like to say, (creepily) "Wade."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you... Vax

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any armor on, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have something.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because this will give you plus one to your AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have regular Studded Leather Armor right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that? How is that... is this better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would that give him a plus two to his AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coldsnap Leather Armor. This would be leather armor, plus two, it would probably give you an additional plus one to your AC if you wear it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not studded leather, it's just leather, but it's plus two to the AC, so yeah. Your AC would go up by one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who wants the Belt of Dwarvenkind? Grog? What's your constitution right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think Pike should have the belt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Constitution up to a 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to grow a fucking beard. I know it does other things, but with a beard--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The only reason any of us want that belt is to grow a beard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah that's true. I'm not going to lie.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, even though there's some very great... aspects... to the belt. That's a plus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My question is, once you grow the beard, if you remove the belt, does the beard fall off or do you get to keep the beard? Because then you guys could just switch around, until everyone had the appropriate amount of facial hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take the armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or does it dissipate at the end of the day when you take it off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's our wonderful Matt Mercer's call.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it, we can hold it until somebody else wants it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no way of knowing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So who's going to take the ring?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does the ring do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, I think, would like the ring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would just like something to help my AC.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your AC?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That would bring you to 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mine's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now 15 with your new armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 15. All right, you take it. I'll just die a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa, whoa, no. Not cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you sure? I'd feel bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey Scanlan, what's your constitution?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You'd look pretty good with a beard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would look really good with a beard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that solves it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well wait, I thought Grog was taking the beard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog has it. Maybe you guys can switch out sometimes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take it. It's a belt, we can just-- oh, but we have to bind it to us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, you take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has better benefits if he doesn't wear armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There hasn't been enough in-game time for this to have actually taken hold yet, has there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You keep take that, I think. It gives you a bonus to your dex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Manual of Quickness of Action. It takes 48 hours worth of reading it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. So I'll have to wait... I'm starting this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can read it over time, like take a couple hours out of each evening, then...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that means everybody got something, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we divide it up that way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We divide everything up?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The only one who didn't is my brother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have a Dagger of Life-Stealing, which steals life.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And also, Scanlan-- and I bring out the Ioun Stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Like I was saying before, you ran out of-- you kept running out of spells. This allows you to store extra spells. I propose a friendly trade for the crown-- circlet-- hat? Whatever you're wearing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The circlet with the hat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is it a circlet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Concentration Circlet?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. I think it would benefit you to have the ring, some sort of spell storing, which you've complained about running out of spells the last few times we've fought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Sorry... sorry. I took that pearl and you wanted it, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: what? (confused laugh)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does what the pearl does but times three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll hold it. And then you can continue on with the next few days and you can cast it from the stone for free.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You know how I keep casting? I keep hucking spells because I keep casting them out of my Ioun Stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So does that mean on one round I could cast a spell and also activate the spell that's stored in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still an action to activate it, but it doesn't use your current spell slot, 'cause you've already stored it in there the day before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never run out of spells.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You ran out of spells the last two battles, and you said that "I can't cast this anymore", where you've--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it gives me an extra level three slot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, if you were to cast a level three spell into it in advance.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or you can cast, like, three of those, or three of those. Things that you would use for other deals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially. It's up to you. You have the crown.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me think about it. Let's think about it and strategize. We'll do this tonight? The three level spells I don't use as much as these. But, if that's what you'd like...

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would like that very, very much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has Vax come back from his man date?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Are we done? Are we ready to do things now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been looking forward to that conversation for two weeks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true. (giggles) That is a true story.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been sitting going, "Maybe he'll say this!" I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well. You did Silence me that time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I had to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't have to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did turn him into a mouse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He liked it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, a super cute mouse!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I-- no. I was going to say you didn't turn me back into a mouse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You also abandoned the party in our most dire moments.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he then did get the killing blow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That... doesn't add to...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, so if I abandon you all and come in at the last minute and take the last shot, I get all the credit? I don't think so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like to be contrary.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: To be fair, gnome, I never abandoned the party at all. I was surveying the situation. My idea was not tried whatsoever. So I merely kept to my word. I did not enter the premises. Only when I needed to save everyone's life, which is exactly what I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so sorry, I missed the last part because my awesome hat was blocking it, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's too big, you're saying you can't wear it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll discuss soon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's not Clarota's thing, that's a different thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that Vax has.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I have the Clarota hat.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And we still have that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it looks wonderful on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You look like Merlin from Excalibur.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we still at Gilmore's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have exited Gilmore's at this time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we standing out on the street divvying up random items?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You guys are essentially in the middle of the thoroughfare in Abadar's Promenade of Emon, bickering over the items you guys are distributing amongst yourselves in broad daylight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I've got a beautiful pearl, so I'm happy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a book!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any shady characters making eyes at our goods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me make a perception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bust out those dice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15 plus... probably crap. Zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Looking about, there are a few folks that walk by and give a strange eye to the seven, nearly eight foot tall goliath. But nothing beyond what you're used to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As a note guys, you do have about two days before the holy receptacle arrives so if there's anything that you want to achieve in that meantime, you're welcome to do so or you can just spend that couple days and relax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? I'm sorry Percy, are you talking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have chicken!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have some tinkering I'd like to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What would you like to tinker?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to try and build a couple things. I have a list actually...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arrows! Arrows for me please. Darling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no. Arrows are on the list. I want to start working on some sort of tazing implement for direct contact. I want to do an electrical charge that I can rev up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wants to make Asami's glove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many things can I start poking with in two days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That glove, that's going to be like a week-long endeavor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a week-long thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even the design phase will take you about two days, acquiring materials.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Night vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Night vision...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Into my current, existing helmet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Night vision, or darkvision, as you would put it, would be more of an enchantment-based acquisition.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way that I could try to pull that together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not via tinkering.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The technological aspects are not, unfortunately, that advanced in this time. Like, shades, probably. You could probably shade some sun. But, actually looking in the dark, that's an actual-- would be more of an arcane situation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good. I want to put a slight dent into the barrel of Bad News to get a ricochet shot, so that it basically allows me, when I shoot a bullet, to also do 1d12 worth of damage to one target that is immediately adjacent to the main target.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shrapnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shrapnel. It's not quite shrapnel, it's a ricochet, but yes it is basically a shrapnel shot.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Like a bank shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, like a bank shot. A secondary lesser damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the Bad News. It's going to be difficult with the Bad News because the sheer power and force that that gun emits on its payload.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would it be possible, if I did it to one of the barrels of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could do it. I'd say it'd probably up your misfire rate by one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So consider that. It's doable, but in messing with the barrel, the chamber, and the trajectory of the weapon, there is that slight increase in the possibility of it jamming or disabling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a possible trade-off. With Bad News, because it travels so fast to do that much damage, any sort of alteration-- it will either not change the course whatsoever, or it'll blow up the gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll start the taser and work on some arrows then. That's what I'd like to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Arrows are viable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go back into Gilmore's and I ask if there's-- if either they or someone else they know can make a specific kind of potion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I actually join him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore is still at his desk.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. "I'm sorry, was there something else you require?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I forgot to ask-- Hello, Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You look particularly perky today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had a rather good day, you could say."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was wondering if I could inquire about a specific kind of scrying potion that I would like made for me. It's a specialty item. I don't know if any exist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, do step into my office." And he leads you into the back room, beyond the beaded curtain. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Is that patchouli I smell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Quite an astute nose you have. I'll be right in. If you don't mind, just hanging tight "just for a moment. Thank you." He steps off in the back room and takes about five minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he's gone, can I look around to see if he has any books on how to start-- like a potion making for dummies book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gilmore, when we get excited, I-- well, never mind that. Anyway, I'm looking for a way, a potion that I could maybe drink or use, to help me look in on a place that we've been to recently. I could maybe leave a mark of some sort, and then use that mark to magically scry into that place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Curious. You're into some things." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a dark side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Give me a day. I should be able to produce such an "item, although this is, I will say-- having not been attempted, there comes a warning of possible "side effects."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I would be drinking this potion and it could affect me in other ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps. The funny thing about unproven magic is, well, it's unproven. I could give you at "least a 90 to 95% guarantee?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. And how much would such a potion cost me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would say for the research, the materials, and seeing as how you are indeed "sponsored by Gilmore's Glorious Goods. At discount, 300 gold?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Did I give away my ruby last time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't remember.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, you still have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much would this get me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a persuasion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have any dice! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I almost gave away mine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a good one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ooh! This is a fine piece."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) It's super-duper flawless 'cause you put it in the Wheel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For trade?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just tell me how much it's worth first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This gem would probably run you anywhere from 200 to 300 gold."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I sense that he's lying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems honest. He seems like he's genuinely looking to make a deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just straight up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it. I'll give you the ruby for the potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a single use, but multiple use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. I can provide for this fantastic specimen, a three use potion? Is that within your "realm of possibility?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be lovely, thank you, Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One day!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One. One wonderful day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One day."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One glorious day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he rubs your shoulder and leads you outside of the room.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait! I have a two part question, Gilmore!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even think you were in there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ha. Ha. As you storm through the beaded curtain, as he's exiting. "Ah! I'm sorry, this "room is private."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I wanted to know, A: How much that ring of

lines.name: WW, B
lines.text: If you knew of somewhere that I could have an existing item enchanted just a little bit. Like make it stronger than it currently is, but not change it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "First off, the ring that we discussed as our original deal, the price would run you "about 1,750."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "1,750 gold pieces. Should you be interested still. As for-- enchantment is a largely permanent "process. To enhance an existing enchantment is a dangerous task that has a very high probability of "ruining the enchantment that currently exists."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. That's good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To increase it, such masters I hear exist in the world, but they are very, very dead. Or "very, very hidden."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hmm. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However, if you wish to upgrade, we are more than happy to oblige!"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't know how to phrase this in RP. So. I wanted it to be-- to have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: More protect-y.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More bigger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: More-- Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. Perhaps we could have one made for you. It would take a few weeks, but we could have "one waiting."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, very good. I would like to arrange that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, you'd have to pay half the price down in front." How much is your Ring of Protection plus two currently labeled as?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So 6,500. That will put you at 3,250 down now. The other half when the enchantment is "complete."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (quietly) That is insane. We didn't buy it for that much, did we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They haggled it down a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We tossed it in with a deal and stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stuff's expensive, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stuff is expensive.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll chill for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Come back if you change your mind."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did I find a book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. We'll get to that now. Roll an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Asking around some of the employees and keeping an eye out, there are a few books on herbalism, how to find and retain the potent elements of various material components found in nature. Also, there are some bits of information about how to extract materials from natural creatures, meaning monsters, beasts both natural and magical. How to remove and preserve safely elements of their organs, and things that can be used in various alchemical compounds and/or potion-brewing. There are no books specifically on the process of brewing, but that is one of the key components to it, is being able to acquire those elements.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I take those books. How much are those books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a single book that contains everything about the herbalism and a book about the extraction of creature components.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I take that book. How much is that book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two books.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much are these books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These books are marked currently at 25 gold "apiece. They are a second printing, but hard to find. Do you wish to purchase?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I'll take both of them. 50 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark off 50 gold. Hands the tomes back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, did I talk to Gilmore about potion classes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, and he said he'll take it under consideration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He'll take it into consideration. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gave you a look like, "Hm."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, maybe? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's tough to tell. He sort of has that look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Without taking too long on it, I was also hoping, while we're in town. That armor that we stole from the big rhinoceros monster in the duergar castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the bulette.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. The armor that we took from him. Is there any way I can find a blacksmith that can maybe upgrade Trinket's armor with that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an interesting thought. All right. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm using the new fancy one, so don't fail me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Don't fail me now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. Easy enough. After asking around town, you manage to find a few individuals to speak with. There are two armor smiths. One that dabbles in both blacksmithing and armor smithing, one that specifically is an armor smith who focuses in strange materials. Mostly ornamental, but has a strong history and past in warfare and honing those skills towards the use of actual battle. You find it's a dwarven woman by the name of Karin, and they send you to her facility. It's a very small, almost a hovel, but when you approach the outside, you can immediately smell this strong scent of iron. Almost like a sulfur and different other chemicals that are used when you're folding metals and making composites. You open the door slightly, and it's very darkly lit on the inside. There's the heat of the forge, and you see this very sturdy, muscular dwarven woman standing in there with her hair graying, and it's pulled back into a very tight bun. She's wearing a leather apron with her sleeves rolled up, and she's in the process of hammering down on a piece of metal over her anvil, just (ping, ting, ting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she have a beard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's just in the middle of her work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (clears throat)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stops for a second. "Oh, sorry, I didn't see you enter! Can I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Karin, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, I'm Karin."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't mean to interrupt. You look very busy here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me just finish."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a nod (huffs), and then goes back into her mode for a second. She makes you wait for a good six minutes while she finishes hammering out this piece, turning and rotating on the edge of the anvil, hammering it into this smooth-- it looks almost like a pauldron, curved point for a shoulder. Then eventually, she (shhh) quenches it in the trough, sets it aside with a (tink, tink). Puts her tools down, takes off her big leather gloves. Wipes her brow, and you see when she wipes it, she wipes the sweat off, but leaves a big old grease mark where once was clean, and goes, "Sorry for the wait. So, what can I do for you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've heard rumor that you are a very talented blacksmith.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, aye. Depends on what you're looking for. What're you putting in the furnace?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have quite an interesting proposition for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like interesting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I may have some material you've never worked with, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you mind stepping outside for a moment? Get some fresh air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, specifically, she goes from extremely welcoming to a very nervous, untrusting look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Believe me, you'll want to see this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why didn't you wink first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll want to see this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh! I don't know which-- that's the problem with having too many. I'm rolling my Trinket die, since it applies to Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That wasn't good. Nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay, she rolled a two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, all right. Sorry, I don't mean to-- I've had a few encounters in the past."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But yes, outside." She walks out, and as she walks out with you, you can see she reaches over and grabs a sheathed shortsword and keeps it at her side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No need for that, darling. Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear moans) Your armored bear comes looming around the corner, at which point she (yelps) goes for the sword instinctually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no! Take a gander at his armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. That's not bad. That's not bad at all!" She walks up to him and carefully-- doesn't want to touch him--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's friendly, don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(shocked laughter) Oh! That was unexpected. Very "friendly one."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt Mercer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trinket, is it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're a nice one, Trinket." She starts rubbing the side of his cheek. (bear moans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He likes you. I can tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Functional. It's taken a few dings. It's seen some "battle."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it has. I'm hoping to protect him a bit more, however.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I can see that. Who made this?" She looks around and pulls it. "Oh, this is the mark of Westruun. This was made over in that-- (scoffs)."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. You can do better, I'm sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're functional, but not the finest. Is this "for a parade or is this for actual combat?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actual combat. Beauty? Not my concern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, all right. And what materials are you looking for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. (grunts)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) As you slam down this awkward, still somewhat wet in places, but mostly dried-out bulette hide that you guys carved from it. And it is big pieces of plate scales with sections of leather underneath, interwoven. It is part of a large behemoth of a creature. As you slam it down, she steps back for a second. "And you-- what manner of creature did this come from?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A very large one, actually. A bull--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bulette?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bulette. That one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I haven't seen one of those found itself to the surface in quite some time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't on the surface. We're a bit of adventurers, if you want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, adventurers. Of course. Sorry, didn't mean "to offend."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've probably heard of us. Vox Machina?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stops for a second and goes, "Actually, yes. I have heard of you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Winter's Crest festival not long ago."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bulette hide? I have not worked with this." She leans down and starts messing with it, seeing how pliable it is in sections. She goes, "There's enough here to redo most of the armor. Most "places. I could minimize spatial use of it and possibly get most of the main plates gathered. I "can work with this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can work with this. It'll take me a few days, unfortunately. It is a rare material."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Is two days enough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two days?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could. I'd have to charge you more, 'cause I'm not going to get much sleep at that rate."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandable. How much is a bit more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you're providing the materials. That definitely cuts the cost significantly. For my "time and work, and lack of sleep--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we will send many, many customers your way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I put my personal brand on this?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, then." You're not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Trinket isn't sponsored, it's just fucking us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "500 gold suffice?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about 450?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why must you dicker?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wah-wah! That would be 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks you over for a second, looks at the material, and you can see in her eyes, there's this interest in working with this material, never touched or worked with it. She goes, "(spits) 450."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (spits) Deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakes hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See you in a few days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two days. All right." And she leans down, picks it up, it is heavy material-- for the most part carrying it around was his job in the bag of holding. She lifts it over one shoulder, (rgh) heads right into the workshop--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Karin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stops for a second, turns around. "Do you mind if I take that armor in the meantime? I "figure I could use that to base the pattern."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take about 15 minutes, she helps take the armor off, she leads it all into the shop, and she goes, "All right. See you in a few days." Closes her door. (bff)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, look at you naked. So cute. All right, sorry that took so long.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, you're back! All right. Shall we start adventuring, then?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where? There's two days to hang out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two days, oh, we're not leaving yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was mostly spacing out last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If there's anything else you guys want to achieve in these next two days, you're welcome to do it now, or we could go ahead and say you relax and take the time to fast-forward through the two-day period.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do my tinkering rolls and then I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. First you wanted to work on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanted to work on a grappling-hook arrow that attaches to the unending-- that ties to the unending rope so that we have actually something that will pierce heavy stone and anchor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Batman. I don't know why Batman's on the brain right now. Could be any reason.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have an Earring of the Wind that I made that I have not enchanted yet. Can I enchant that in two days to make another one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one of the speaking earrings?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There is the existing functional one, but over the time since I gave them out I only had time to make one extra one, but I have to enchant them also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I would say you could begin the process, you get halfway through. It would take you the better part of a week to complete the earring, which is what it did before when you first made them. But you can begin the process. You definitely have your laboratory now in Greyskull Keep, and that gives you a bonus to the rolls you make to enchant it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh, can I start it and then if we leave I can have one of the helpers--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could probably have Allura come and finish it if you wanted to ask her.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, okay, well. Cool then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll start that, yeah. I'll start doing the one that I made.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, getting the enchantment on that. All right. Go ahead and make your first tinkering check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. First tinkering roll is 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a secondary roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay. You're having-- this is including your tinker bonus, your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just proficiency bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you started having a little bit of a problem with the mechanism. It keeps sticking and having a hard time actually retracting or springing from the arrow point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a little more time than you anticipated with it. Go ahead and make a final roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspire him before he makes this roll with a little inspiration song or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Scanlan comes down into your workshop underneath Greyskull Keep. You hear a fine little ditty to inspire you in your work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Whoa, I hear you're tinkering, whoa, please do it well. Take my hand and you'll tinker I swear.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel inspired.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sing) Tinkering on a prayer!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we go. Now I feel inspired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was about to give you a d6, but that'll be the full d10. So on this final roll, go ahead and-- what did you roll initially?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually don't even remember, but it wasn't that bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. So that's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay. With that bit of inspiration going in your little Scanlan-based soundtrack--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sings) Tinkering on a prayer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- you realize that some of the gears that were sticking, you recut them out, insert it, and like butter (shnk) it sticks out and retracts. So you have one grappling arrow completed. For material costs, it came to about 100 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 100 gold. And then I want to try and recreate the exploding arrow as my last little thing I want to do today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, we've got to go back and get our money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, oh my gosh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no shit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what we've got to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is like 30k sitting for us in--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we just send our minions to get it? Like our servants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax has something he'd like to add.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike, dear, dear friend, can you hear me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yes, I know, we're getting to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was wondering if maybe you and I could swing by the temple of Serren-rae and fix my foot.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Saran Wrap?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it's Sarenrae, but that's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm three-fourths an atheist, darling, but I know that my foot doesn't fucking work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I know. And I was going to say the past couple days I think I've spent at the temple trying to sort of reconnect and really just tune in and apologize and confess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sounds like a day spa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you return to this temple, the same temple where you yourself were resurrected after falling to the treachery demon naught but eight months previous. Returning to that place, especially after your recent journey and near brushes with death again, is a very solemn experience, and there's a part of you that just feels internally cold, both returning there and because of your strangely fractured connection with Sarenrae since you delved into the Underdark and tapped into your darker side since traveling abroad on the ship. You take approximately six hours out of each day to just go in silent prayer and reach out to her. I will say, go ahead and make a wisdom check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your second six-hour period of intense--

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Six hours!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like an ayahuasca experience.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you have a bathroom break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- intense communion with Sarenrae, sweat pouring down your body. The room itself is pretty cold, but for some reason your body is just growing more and more intense with heat. You feel yourself internalizing all of the steps and missteps that you've gone through over these past six or seven months, trying to find your path, rediscovering yourself and what you have to do to prevent yourself or any of your friends from falling to the fate that you once did, and explaining to her that your love never left and that this was all with the ultimate purpose of achieving her ultimate purpose as her instrument, and you wish not to cross that again, and if there's any way to redeem yourself, to let it be known to you. At the end of that period of time, you feel since you've lost that connection in the Underdark, that thread reconnect, the warmth fills you, and the sweat stops as your entire body seems to be humming with energy. For a brief second in your face, in your eyes, in your vision you can see the beautiful gold, gleaming, fire-wreathed head of Sarenrae smiling at you as she reaches down and touches the side of your cheek and says, "Be forthright. Be grand. Burn bright and beautiful, and I shall always be at your side." And with that, she releases your cheek and vanishes, the vision gone in the temple, and you can see two other clerics that were silent, muttering prayer, have gone quiet and are both staring at you with a look of like, 'what just happened.'

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, Pike, yay!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yay, yay, yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all cheer)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey man, that was my new special Celtic die that whoever sent to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a cultural gnome thing, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, well, to start things off, then, how is Liam's foot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's this Liam guy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm-- what am I saying? I mean, how is Vax's foot? I'm not sure who Liam is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step out--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step out of the central chamber of the temple of Sarenrae, Vax has been waiting there for a while, wanted to actually ask for your aid in this. As you see her step out of the main chamber, Vax, she has a look of serenity in her face you haven't seen in quite some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this the moment?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I take my shoe off? Vex, look, I'll take my shoe off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it. Don't do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here, just sit on this rock, okay? Take off your shoe. Hoo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the first time, you're safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. That's disgusting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Proud of you right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps maybe you could give it one more try today? You seem to have a bit of a glow about you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 30? 30 points of healing. As you're saying this and you're stuttering this out, she goes into a singular trance, clutches her holy symbol with one hand, and reaches out and grabs your foot with the other. Her hand almost burns at the touch, something you instinctively pull back on, but her grip is like an iron vice and you cannot release yourself from it. And as she just intensely focuses forward, you can see this glowing divine energy transfer from down her forearm into your foot. Fear reaches you suddenly because you don't understand the divine, and though you've seen some crazy things, this is a little worrying. You've seen some shit. I want you to go ahead and make a medicine roll with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It feels like IcyHot! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ye olde IcyHot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The scent of Vicks VapoRub hits your system.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And another one, you get advantage, you can do it again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a lot better. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And your nails have been painted red. Red nails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, and you know what? It doesn't smell as bad now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stick my foot in my sister's face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, thank you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to miss that bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't even smell bad anymore, so thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, not so fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many-- you have time probably to attempt three arrows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try for three exploding arrows. And I've built one before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you have, I know. I'm still keeping that in mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Materials per arrow will cost 50 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another 150 gold? All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll give it to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 150 gold for materials. You have your goggles on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I won't even haggle with you, Percy, I'll just give it to you. I mean, well, you know. You know what I mean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I certainly do. I know exactly what you mean. No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's going a bit beyond winking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I'm nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So coming off the high from making your grappling arrow, you sit down, you're alone in the middle of your workshop, it's hot in there, it's subterranean, you have the glow of your candlelight around you, you have your goggles on, your blacksmith leather gloves on, and you're tinkering with the delivery method of these small, concussive arrows. Go ahead and make your first roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. With deftness, you rapidly complete the first arrow, wrapping up the powder charge, the impact point, and the arrow itself weighted to be fair and balanced to be flung from a longbow. Make your second roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Fox News.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Second arrow takes a little longer, but you still manage to keep the flow going, complete it fine. Third and final roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's an extra-special arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not only did you complete this in record time, but the arrow itself looks beautiful. It could be a display case item.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it do extra damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll find out. But I would mark that arrow separately from the other two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You would mark it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark it as two exploding arrows and one exploding arrow with a star next to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you have a grappling hook arrow, two exploding arrows, and one exploding arrow with a star.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come here, you beautiful bastard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting to kiss everybody in this game. I've already made my way through siblings, this is getting-- all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so true, you have!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah, you've been to that party before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've kissed the twins. I have, well, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, any other business you guys wish to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, is there a tavern nearby? Just a quick question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are many taverns. The one you know the best is the Laughing Lamia, which you guys previously stayed at.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the biggest one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty large, it's pretty large.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aside from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to do this via conversational persuasion or through intimidation? Because there are two ways you can go with this, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're wearing the belt that makes you extra persuasive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only with dwarves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Persuasive... yeah, well, maybe there's some dwarves hanging about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There might be some dwarves!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So how are you doing this? Okay, make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I be with him just to watch?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was there also a grappling arrow, Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm with you, Grog, just watching.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm still enchanting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Possibly reusable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go read my potion book?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What dice are you rolling?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grow a giant pubic mane from the belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enchanted merkin plus two.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Dude. You've got to check your balanced dice, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you burst in and shout this to the group, everyone stops and turns and looks... and then goes right back to drinking and their conversation. There appears to be no immediate reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I jump up-- I jump up on a table and I say, Listen, you motherfuckers, my friend just asked you a fucking question, now fucking answer him or I'm going to kill every last motherfucking one of you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd listen to him, he means it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a 20?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please be good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled, that would be a 30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thug life. That's amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, no. Yes, 28. I added wrong. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, well that makes the difference. So in an unseen display, the goliath storms into the bar and makes no impact, yet the tiniest gnome jumps onto the table like a ravenous wolverine, frothing at the mouth, his wild eyes staring about the dark interior of the Laughing Lamia. All the patrons at the table around him, you can see, lean back in fear, caught off-guard by this entirely, one man holding a drink just drops it and you hear it shatter on the ground. Everyone gets quiet again, but stays quiet. Even the small band playing in the far corner, you hear like (gee-uh), a discordant sound as all instruments break to a halt, the dancer stops, the whole room is dead-silent. At which point a nearby halfling, you can see he's unkempt, farmer-tan looking fellow, looks up and he goes, "Um. No...?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for your forthrightness and honesty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Had to bury them out there. It was terrible."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds awful. You said up north, how far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just in the Silvercoat Runway. The way south of Kraghammer, on the way to Westruun."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Anything else you'd like to know, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Killer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for your troubles. Here, let me buy you a drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I'll take that." And he goes over, walks with you to the bar, toss him a gold, he gets his ale, and, "You know, I've always shat on gnomes, but today I think you've represented "them well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You, my friend, have good taste.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had no idea. That was amazing, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For you, anything. Hey, grow a beard tomorrow morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. We'll say over the period of two days go by-- Grog, what's the percentage on your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 50% chance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a percentile dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we've never done one of those before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, percentile dice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That a 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, a percentile dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's a percentile dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's two ten-siders. There should be one that has double-digits and one that has single.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, just one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60, then roll another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double zeroes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 100, that's a 100.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, well that was a 60 and then that was for the second digit, so you rolled a 60.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, over the period of the next morning you wake up excited and check... smooth as a baby's bum.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as the two-day period comes to an end, you guys acquire, early in the morning that morning as you finish your breakfast, a messenger comes to the front of Greyskull Keep and delivers a summons to the Council of Tal'Dorei that notifies you that the package has arrived at the Council. Very very quick, to the point words, not very verbose, in the idea of keeping it vague and secret, but you know what it means.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think it's the model plane I ordered?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it is, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a guess, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, should we go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So mark down that you spent two of four days of enchanting on that second earring, and you can get back to that if you manage to find yourself to some sort of a laboratory elsewhere, or you can return to your--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can we stop at-- is Allura, is she here or not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura? She might be in the Cloudtop District in her tower. You can inquire.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And do we-- does she have helpers there, when we were there, do you remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she was just herself.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It was just herself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She runs it herself.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the last two days, have I gone back to Gilmore to pick up my item?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got back, your item was completed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What kind of potion did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a potion that, when combined with-- when consumed, can allow me to leave a mark of some sort that possibly I could use to have visions of what is in the area. The mechanics of which I would not like to get into at this moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he gives you the potion. "It was a curious endeavor, but I think you'll be happy with "the results."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so he can spy on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any chance to talk to you, Gilmore, leaves me happy beyond compare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, stop it, flattery will get you everywhere."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you have an erection for more than 24 hours...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get that potion so you can spy on Pike when she's naked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am offended, and terrified at the assumption that I would sink so low!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As to spy on my good friend and future wife Pike when her pantaloons are down. Not at all. How dare you. How dare you! Have I ever spied?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On a member of our current party?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you have.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Current party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiberius, can you bamf us to the place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just wanted to make sure you remembered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, I do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It doesn't work like that. I can bamf us back here when we're done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you've acquired your potion, it's a brackish purple color; it's a purple-grey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Purple-grey. Okay. I've got it. Great, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go back to Karin and indeed the armor is completed. It's interesting, it makes Trinket look like a roly-poly, almost.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's so cute!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's these overlaid giant grey scales that overlap in armored sections and you would imagine, if you wanted-- could roll in a ball and she would look adorable. He would. But yeah, it's, the armor--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You really, really want Trinket to be a girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know why I've got it in my head, I don't. You know what it is? It's because my bird I thought was a boy for the longest time, and we found out the bird was a girl, and so I got used to transitioning to she when I talk about animals since then. I apologize.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I see. Understandable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is a boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Boy. And maybe he could roll into things now! It'll be awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can he roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll try it if you want to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roly-poly bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bears aren't known for their rolling capabilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is a special bear.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How much does Trinket weigh again? Like 600 pounds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He weighs a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Call it a "bear-rel" roll.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He's not over a thousand pounds though. Is it 800 pounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's pushing about 800 pounds, probably.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He's 800 pounds, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He weighs more than Grog.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can fastball special him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Fastball special Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the benefits of this. Trinket acquires an additional plus two to Trinket's armor class over his previous armor, which he gains from the bulette.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That puts him at 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fantastic. Also, Trinket has resistance against non-magical bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if anyone attempts to go after Trinket with a giant hammer or you know something that is bludgeon-type damage--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or a mace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- or a giant mace, anything. If I ever attack Trinket with something that seems bludgeoning and you say, ah-ah, is that bludgeoning? Call me on it and it could be reduced by half.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if someone tries to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if I did try to roll him into something it wouldn't hurt him--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- because that would technically be bludgeoning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hitting the wall, Trinket would be like, "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if someone tried to hit Trinket with a salmon?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's also bludgeoning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fish damage, it's a different arcane type of damage. Fire, lightning, fish, it's a whole thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go see the Council.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go. All right. To the Council!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I learn anything from my herbalism book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What the books are is you keep them with you, and if you wish to reference them while taking any sort of herbalism roll, they will essentially give you a momentary bonus to it. They will double your proficiency bonus for any rolls for herbalism or to harvest any pieces of a creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So keep that in mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go to the Council.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you proficient in herbalism?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you proficient in herbalism? Or medicine I guess it would be now, sorry. Herbalism is, sorry, that's old systems.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I'm proficient in nature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say nature, it'd be nature. I've run too many systems. Too many games. So we'll say, are you proficient in nature?

lines.name: MARISHA
