lines.text: Yeah. Druid, yo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you double your proficiency bonus on any nature rolls to do either of those things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep that in mind. All right. So. You guys head to the Cloudtop District towards the palace in the center. You were about to say something, Orion?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to talk to Allura while you're here, or not?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should talk to her. Talk to her.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She has no interest in me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She looks really pretty today, Tiberius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She won't have any interest if you don't talk to her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It looks like she put some lip stuff on.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm sure Lady Kima can satisfy any needs she has.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they're just friends, darling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't want to look back and regret what you didn't say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Say what you need to say.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sings) Say what you need to say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Listen to the tiny disembodied head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We can stop by there, okay. I only have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nearly across the street from the palace. So you head to the ivory tower, you go ahead and you take the giant circular knocker on the door, hit it a couple times, eventually Allura comes, this time in what looks like more comfortable robes. She was caught off-guard. She has like a terry cloth or some sort of big fuzzy material, her hair's a bit in disarray. She opens the door. "Oh. Hello. Greetings, I'm sorry, I wasn't expecting company."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time it's probably about, I'd say, 11 in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she's a late sleeper, I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On like a Sunday?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roughly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roughly, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We were about to depart on another adventure and whatnot, and I was working on an enchantment on this particular-- I'll show her what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yes, yes, of course."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's an enchantment that's easily, you know, finished enough. I was wondering if in our absence, in your spare time you could probably put some time into finishing the enchantment whilst we're away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That should not be a problem. I was intending to complete the circle of teleportation "markings that I had promised you for your Keep in your absence. So."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! Just waiting there as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could do both while I'm there."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you so much, Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would be my pleasure, Tiberius."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It is-- (sputtering) Well. Okay. I'll bid you farewell. And I'll do Prestidigitation (pfft)-- a local flower, I'll give to her. For your trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A purple dandy, as it's called, it's like a star-like purple flower, projects itself from your hand. You hand it to her and you see she puts her hand in her face a second. "Thank you very much, "Tiberius, I appreciate it."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is-- you've been here too short to leave so soon, so don't stay long, please." Closes the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shake his shoulders. Look at you!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Who knew?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you like me, yes, no, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps forward, her piercing green eyes hit the group immediately and she goes, "Hello. I am "Scalebearer Desona, also under the Platinum Dragon and will be escorting you on this mission." They both step back towards the box in a very ceremonial way. Everyone looks to the rest of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, nice to meet you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I was writing down your name, Desona, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it Vorak and Desona?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Desona.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lovely to meet you. I'm Scanlan, I'm sort of the de facto leader of the group.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That is not true. I am Tiberius Stormwind, hello, nice to meet you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everyone introduce yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Percival Fredrickstein Klossowski von Mussel de Rolo III. At your service.

lines.name: ORION, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: You can call him Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They call me Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look about the rest of the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi. And you'll be accompanying us on this arduous journey to the nor-- where are we going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vasselheim, to the northwest, in the region of Othanzia."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "On the continent of Isilra. It's quite a ways."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we taking a skyship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're taking an airship of some sort.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, a skyship is to be provided." They look at the Council, and the Council nods to themselves and you can see Seeker Emring steps forward. "Yes, yes, a skyship will be provided, waiting for you at the skyport here in the "Cloudtop District. We're just awaiting one more." As he says that, the door opens again, and you can see Lady Kima steps in. No longer in the gold armor that she had found-- scavenged from the interior, she's now dressed in proper silver and blue inlaid plate mail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who is this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Kima!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is wearing the same colors as the two envoys, you can see now the silver and blue theme of Bahamut is very much on display in this traveling crew. "Sorry I'm late, had to get "ready."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look wonderful, Lady Kima.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you look wonderful, Lady Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you, thank you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite, quite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I. Do we have--" She looks about the rest of the group with a look of somewhat kind of-- "Do we have the artifact?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were we supposed to bring that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shall we place the artifact in its container?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'll get it. I reach in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, Grog Grog Grog. No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No no no no. Tiberius, if you would be so kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mage Hand?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I'll hold the thing up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're putting it in the box, yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Putting it in the box.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it takes a moment. The use of Mage Hand in a Bag of Holding is a very meticulous process, because the Bag of Holding responds to the thought command of what you're reaching for the moment you reach in with your physical hand. Using it as an arcane tether it's almost like reaching through jello to get there, so you have to really concentrate to get it through. Eventually the Mage Hand takes hold of something. You feel the tingling of something weighty in the grasp of your arcane focus and as you lift out, there aloft you can see the dark, twisted Horn of Orcus. As it's removed, this is the first time the Council's really seen it at this point, and there's an audible leaving of breath in the room, everyone at its presence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty horrible.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on a second. We're putting this in the container, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the box, the magic box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I put it inside the Bag of Holding real quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back in the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. I'm going to take off a tiny piece of one of my tickets of Telescription, and I'm going to enchant it and I want to attempt to do an enchantment spell where-- I want to put it at the bottom of where I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The box?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: -- the box, and if it's, if any weight is lifted from it, I'll know. Like, if there's the old switcheroo somehow--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, I so wish we still had the troll dick right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh man. Because I would've used the troll dick instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is already enchanted. To re-enchant it is a difficult process, plus enchanting anything would take time. It's essentially an Alarm spell, you could do it, but it would take probably half a day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we can trust them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus adding extra runes in there might jack up the enchantment they already put in the box.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's a tiny piece of paper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think we're good.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But fine, if I can't do it then, I just wanted to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, it's fine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I put it in there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was a good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you had an Alarm spell at your disposal too, that would be what the enchantment's based. I don't know if you learned Alarm, did you?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd be a little different.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So I put it in the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima looks about the rest of you. "So. Onward?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kima, you're coming with us as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Damn right. I haven't been back to my temple in quite some time. It will be good to see "Vord."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Kima, I'm wondering, who do we speak to? Who flies the ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I haven't taken a skyship in quite a while."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm excited!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I've never been on one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If we could, maybe we should ask if they could stop at Kraghammer for a second, we could drop in and get our money really quick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the way back, I think. Once the Horn is off the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably best not to bring it there, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You know, yeah, we can use the airship later on for stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Which is cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Which is cool.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We have an airship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is this airship made out of?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Air and ships.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And wood and magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It only floats a couple feet off the ground, it's not that big of a deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pull Vex aside for one second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Before we go on this quick journey. We trust all the people who are sending this along this journey, right? We trust the Council?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe so. I mean, we did a few insight type things last time, but I mean, we can do some more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (quietly) But what about the... they sent the new guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should definitely talk up the new guards and see what kind of people they are when we're on our way to the ship, how about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Good to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brother on the guy, sister on the girl?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or Scanlan on one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take the girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take the guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is crazy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm bald.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see roughly five individuals standing, all in gold and white armor of various types, and they are seemingly employees. They are currently standing, waiting for you. There is one individual that is more adorned in what looks like a captain's uniform, if you will, and above them, with a bunch of ropes hanging from the sides of it, you can see what looks like a large, beautifully crafted wooden ship that has golden scrolling, this beautiful elven-like golden scrolling across the entire underside of this wooden ship. You don't see propellers, you see what looks like two almost wing-like protrusions on the sides of it, almost like two fans that open up that are probably used to guide pitch. At the very front of it, you can see what looks to be in the center of the ship one large ten to 15 foot-wide blue crystal that is embedded in the front of the ship and on the back two more that are currently attached to the back side. These stones slowly rotate in place where they are, and you can see there's this slight hum of arcane energy that seems to emanate from them. You can immediately gather that these three blue stones are what holds the ship aloft. Silent and beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to walk up towards this ship, looming about 15 or 20 feet in the air, the individuals in front of you all of a sudden glance over and notice, and the captain steps forward, reaches out his hand. "Hi. I'm glad you could finally make it. We've been waiting for a good 30 "minutes. I'm Captain Damon, I would like to welcome you aboard the skyship Deera. We are "traveling across the ocean, it's approximately a week's worth of travel. We have provisions "provided for you. Do you have any questions?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain Damon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just making sure I got your name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And like Skipper Veera? Who was?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Airship. The airship's called Deera. Deera?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deera.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the airship.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go up to Captain Damon and I put out my hand and I say, "Captain Damon, it is a very-- "pleasure is all mine."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sturdy shake.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was a deckhand on the Broken Howl and we heard of many adventures that you had, and maybe you've heard of the Broken Howl, maybe you haven't, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but I'm willing to hear."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a pleasure to ride on an airship, so thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it's a pleasure to have you. Keep everything away from the sides."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was about to say, I run over to the side and look over the edge before he says that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are still on the platform, he hasn't led you up to the ship yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the platform have like a ledge I can look over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the Empire State Building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you do that, "You really shouldn't do-- she shouldn't do that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, this is really high!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She really shouldn't do that, I don't--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, it's really windy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right, she can fly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run up behind her and I grab her shoulders to scare her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I climb up on the ledge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you're climbing up on the ledge, Grog comes over and goes, "Boo!" and shoves you and gives you a scare.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you pee a little?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point you can see the captain's like (panting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, Captain Damon, they're--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, guys you should try--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She can fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, hold the edge of my shirt, I want to feel like I'm flying for a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woo-hoo-hoo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we could all please make our way to the ship, we will leave post-haste."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, you should try this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slowly facepalms and glances sidelong to you and goes, "A week. We have a week."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A week. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have flown before. You do remember that, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, but I'm always an animal.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's true. As they're doing this, I want to go to the opposite end so I can get like-- because this is beautiful, and I want to hold out my staff and I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to take a selfie?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm going to cast Image Capture--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Selfie staff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Image Capture?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a thing?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It is in Draconia.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Selfie staff!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we taking selfies?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we are.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Getting all of them and the airship while they're doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You use your Prestidigitation to temporarily capture an image of yourself at the edge of the top of the tower.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And the airship is in it too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In doing so, the DM imposes disadvantage on your next two rolls.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ohh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's fine, it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nobody likes a selfie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just hate selfie sticks so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, what about selfie staffs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Selfie staffs, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They are the worst.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Selfie staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let it pass. It's temporary.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Look, everyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good one, that's a really good one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this loud whistle, this (wheee-ooo), and the captain you see is blowing on this loud metal whistle around his neck. "All aboard! On to the Deera, folks." And everyone starts climbing up the ropes that are underneath the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, ropes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you guys need any help, I can totally help. Just so you know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughs) I can totally do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain Damon, just morbid curiosity. Are you married? Do you have a steady girl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never mind, we'll talk later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing negative, just really confused. So as you all climb your way to the deck, you get on top of it and it is-- the whole deck has this strange, slow-floating sensation and once you're on the deck you can hear this crackling hum around the large blue stones holding it aloft.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, how did Trinket get up if we had to climb ropes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will say (laughs) there are ways, and if you ask this question, how'd they get Trinket up, they go ahead--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Winches.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Winches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to say, no, the captain gets back on the ship, goes off to the side, and what you didn't notice on the far end of the platform there is like a large crane-like structure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cargo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They actually raise up Trinket in a small sling-like contraption.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're okay, darling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (worried bear noises) As Trinket's-- it was bad enough trying to fly when you guys were in the Underdark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now just paddling in the air absentmindedly as the crane contraption brings Trinket back over and lowers him onto the deck of the airship Deera.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually releasing. Trinket's now on board and looks noticeably uncomfortable and is in the center of the ship sitting down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that when he's nervous. Don't mind him, talk to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Everyone on board?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. To your quarters underneath. We set out now to Vasselheim." He blows his whistle a second time. All the hands separate, most of them go underneath the deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's the box, where's the box. Are we keeping an eye on the box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can see now the two Scalebearers are carrying the box underneath, and on the deck you can see there are doorways that lead into various levels underneath the deck of the ship, there is a large cargo lattice section in the middle of the ship where they're putting larger things down below, there is the actual wheel of the ship is on the back end, on the elevated back end of the entire ship, and that's where the captains stands up to as the rest of the hands bring all the ropes up from the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to stay on top, but I feel like I should go to keep an eye on the box and see and make sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys. But as the ropes are brought up, everyone gives a thumbs-up on the sides, he reaches the front of the ship's wheel, you see he takes something from his neck and places it into the center of the wheel, at which point the three blue stones spark with additional life. The humming gets louder, the ship lurches for a second, and begins to lift upward with this slow, gradual sensation. All of you at once, your stomach gets that butterfly sensation for a second, at which point the captain leans forward, the actual wheel moves forward slightly, and the whole ship (whoosh) lurches forward, up and over Emon, and those of you who are on the deck, you can look below you over the side, you can see the entirety of Emon from above slowly drift away as the endless ocean of the Ozmit Sea comes towards you, clouds ahead, beginning your trek to the distant land.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can see my Keep from here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we see Castle Greyskull?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see, it's a little blip from here and it's slowly vanishing, but you can definitely see it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Greyskull Keep!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've gotten to sleep there for two days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and on that note we'll go ahead and take our bathroom break real fast, take a bio rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will be about ten minutes, because I haven't actually eaten yet either, I haven't had time to eat the wonderful food that you guys provided. Thank you again for dinner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, go get food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you for the food, it's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chat bought us an amazing spread. Uh-oh, Overlords.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You guys can go on your break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got this, we'll see you guys in a moment.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You can still donate to 826LA if they can post that donation link in the chatroom for you. We will not be reading donations tonight from anything less than $20, just so we're not here for another hour, because that's-- it's a lot of messages, so $20 and up and we'll read it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't plug 826 at the top, either.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We did not plug 826 at the top, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So yeah, for those of you who might be new, those of you who are veterans, you already know, but 826LA is our charity of choice. They are a after-school non-profit program for kids K-12th grade, and they focus on creative writing and imaginative storytelling and they're right up our alley, and they have awesome storefronts. They have the one in Mar Vista and the one in Echo Park if you are LA local, and there's probably an 826 in your area.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Why don't you and I go film a video with them at their storefront that we could play in the in-between parts of the show?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we need that, I messaged them about that and they're totally down.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So yeah.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So we'll hopefully have a video for you guys soon that could show you a little bit about 826LA and who they are so we put a face to the organization that you guys are donating to. The other thing I would like to say is-- Lucas, we're 200 away from 4,000?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What what!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We have shows about movies, we have shows about comic books, it's very different for a Twitch channel. We're trying to do things a lot differently. That being said, we don't accept donations, all donations go to charity 100%. We do not take any percentage of charity donations, so subscriptions are the way that this channel keeps running. If you like this show, and you like our other programming, you should subscribe, that's what keeps us going. We're trying to get to 7,000 subscribers, because that's what will make us break even and start being able to experiment with newer and much larger programming outside of what you already see here. So if we get to 4,000 by the end of tonight... Man, what's something crazy that I could do? What's that, Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Streak!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she hiked down the mountain towards Stillben, she meditated on the task ahead. Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then one night, Percy had a dream. A roaring cloud of smoke offered him vengeance against those who destroyed his family. When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Little did she know that in a few years' time, Grog would soon return the favor and bring her back from the clutches of death. After being killed in battle, Pike felt angry. She wanted to be stronger so that it would never happen again. She spent four months at sea, training with the men and women aboard a ship called the Broken Howl. Gripping her holy symbol in one hand and her morningstar in the other, this time, Pike is ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Some may describe me as buffoonish, but I say poppycock to all that. I am much sharper than most give me credit for. I just don't pay attention to things sometimes. I've also been known to be rather cunning, loyal, happy-go-lucky, and well, dangerous. I can't help but show my true scales every now and then. But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An outsider since birth, Vax quickly learned to solve life's challenges in his own particular way, often by side-stepping them entirely. And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, (knife scraping) the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. We have eaten, we have had drinks, we have used the restroom, and now we return to adventure. While we were gone, I hear that there was a ridiculous thing that our wondrous Overlord put as a subscriber opportunity.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm going to regret it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If we somehow get to 4,000--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We've already gotten 70 subs since I announced it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so if we get to 4,000 subs tonight, we're going to have Ify and people of the Vox Moronica crew, that did our quick little one-shot at the DM episode, create a rap and shoot a music video that will include us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, guys, one time offer. You're going to let it slip through your fingers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That'll include us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll include us in it some way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to shoot a rap video?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to shoot a rap video?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If they get to 4,000--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By the end of the show?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- subscribers, yeah, by the end of the show.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just so crazy it might work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) Oh! Is this a challenge?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is this going to be like a role reversal thing? In like an alternate universe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think the Overlord just threw down the gauntlet of Vox Moronica looking better than Vox Machina in the music video.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he underestimates how naturally pretty we all are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think we're underestimating how naturally ridiculous that crew is, so it is a good challenge. It's a tough call.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you kindly, my dear. DM presents are nice. It's delicious brandy, thank you.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's special.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope, none for you, darling.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right folks. Welcome back. Let's get back into the swing of things. Quick reminder, every 50 subscribers we give out a signed player's handbook and a signed cast photo. We also have the shirts for sale on the Teespring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get some shirts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We made those in honor of E3.

lines.text: Soul Hunter keys have been going away, but for those who missed it earlier there's a new app out called Soul Hunters that I did some voices on and if you download the game and put in the promo code "criticalrole," one word, you get a free character that I voiced as well so check it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By the way, I will say, Soul Hunters is a misleading title because that sounds dark and ominous and it's a super cute game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's a weird choice then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, wouldn't you think it sounds dark and ominous? It's super cute. It's like with cute chibi RPG characters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no, there's no more keys. It's just the promo code you can use now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Weird. Cool choice. Strange, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Returning back. You guys are now traversing the extended Ozmit Sea towards Othanzia upon the skyship Deera.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How many days away are we now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, we'll start it about two days into the journey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to spend that time reading my book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and me too. I'll read books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys take time studying. We'll say you probably have a few more days of eight-hour days studying, going about eight to ten hours a day if you want to take in the reading books you got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll also go ahead and-- oh you have this book! Are you reading that book?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm reading that book.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you know what we always need? What we always need?

lines.text: Anti-petrify?

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Oh yeah, that's true.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can't we add a little bit extra square footage to the magic carpet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it doesn't work that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll make a Polymorph scroll and give it to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about a steampunk rocket pack for the bear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This isn't World of Warcraft.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working on it!

lines.text: Well I can make-- I just put whatever spells I've learned for the day, I can put those-- depending on the level, like a 3rd-level spell scroll will take me four to six hours, so the higher the spell, the longer it takes. So, if I spend two days I can probably make four scrolls? Four or five scrolls?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's some pretty good shit. So I'll definitely make a Polymorph scroll for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me first double-check about the time process. Creating a scroll...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the way it was in Pathfinder, I am using Pathfinder rules.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm getting so many things added to my inventory during this game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! (singing) We went shopping!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is exciting. I got arrows, I got scrolls. I have a question about Trinket's new armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It has an area for me to ride on him still, right? Like the other armor? I forgot to mention it to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I mean, there's not like a saddle or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But the last one had a divot thing so I could fit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's built off the design of the original armor that you had customized so, yeah, that's still there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a bow on this ship? Like a front, pointy part?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike and I would like to go to the front of the ship and I would like to stand at the front and put my arms out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm going to hold his waist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm going to shout: I'm the goliath of the world!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he fell right off the front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, thank you Pike! I feel like I'm flying!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You are! You are!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at the guns on that gnome!

lines.text: I can spend the days crafting and then wouldn't I just need whatever gold that would be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mean just crafting the jewelry element of it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, because the enchantment's-- that's over there. I'm just not doing anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't bring any crafting tools with you for that. Crafting jewelry requires a specific set of tools. Yeah, unfortunately. When you touch down, you can try to find somebody in the vicinity. The journey, here, y'know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, airship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Since Vax has nothing really to prepare ever and he's in obviously peak physical condition, I'm going to spend the trip helping Keyleth and if she needs any ingredients for whatever she's doing, I'll go get them, I'll hold things up for her, I'm just going to hang out and try to help her get things done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so helpful, brother.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like I have a little familiar. A scroll-making familiar!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, not bad, not bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hard to pin down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the time being, because I don't want to spend too much time with the internet watching me scan through the books to find the rules for scroll crafting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the best part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah. I'll say for the time being, it'll take you about half a day to make the Polymorph scroll and the material components that are required for the spell putting into the actual scroll would run you about 300 gold, I'll say. Oh, 400 gold because it's a 4th-level spell isn't it? What level spell is Polymorph?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 400 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, how much gold do we have left anyway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, I can use my personal but we have very little party funds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I still have a little personal money left too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure it'll be different later but whatever. They're on a ship so it's hard to get the materials.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine, we'll be fine. Don't waste your money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what money's for. I'm going to do two Polymorph spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And give one to Vex and one to Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'm taking 400 gold out of my personal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll take 400 out of mine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I still have mine. I can give you 400.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll give me 400? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm spending most of the time up near Captain Damon, watching him work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's relaxing. Let's say, the beginning of day three, as you all are resting underneath the hold, you're all shaken awake by a sudden lurching of the ship. It just shifts in such a heavy way that you aren't expecting it. All of you are pulled out of your stupor for a second and begin coming out of your individual rooms to check on each other and see what happened, but apparently the ship is or was-- some sort of a shuddering physicality to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rush to the box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rush to Captain Damon. What the hell just happened? Also, are you married?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you rush straight to the box and as you go to open the door that leads to the boxes, you can see, in the room, is Kima and both of the Scalebearers are there, reaching for weapons as the door opens. They see you and relax for a second and Kima goes like, "What was that? What "was that?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to ask you the same thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I rush up to the bow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also rush to the deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's flapping giant wings and lets out a screech as it takes off, but it looks like there's something on its back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see two to three more of these now starting to divebomb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Daenerys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the rest of the deckhands are up there now, with weapons ready, and are starting to fight some of these off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we use any kind of perception to see if the things on them are controlling them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get plus two for any dragon-y things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tiberius, your brothers are here!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't think I'm associated with these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Glancing at the backs of these--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (garbled) 26!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. All right, between the two of you, you notice that even in this low-light circumstance, there appear to be on three of these winged, dragon-like creatures smallish, humanoid entities that are on small, almost leather strapped saddles that are put on the sides of this creature. They're clutching onto it and each one is carrying some sort of large, spear-like weapon. There is a fourth one in the distance that does not appear to be dragonoid. This one appears to be feather-covered in its physical form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feather-covered?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think-- I remember you had to be damaged, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bunny go splat, bunny go die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, yeah, I think--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bunny go bye-bye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thumper's toast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It lasts for the duration or until the target drops to zero hit points or dies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He just, you know, is a falling bunny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a falling bunny. That is going to be one dead wyvern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing. Everything's falling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you let me know when he hits the ground, when he falls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will, don't worry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well it's the ocean, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll hear the guts splat out of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might end up not hitting...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Terminal velocity for a bunny rabbit. I have to consider this as a DM now. This is a thing in my existence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's the same. You throw a penny, you throw a cow off the Empire State Building, they'll both fall at the same time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How high up are we, and how much does the bunny weigh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell, you cannot make any details--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do the math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: you're a long, long way up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Getting flashes of Holy Grail here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. So the grappling hook (woo tink) onto the side here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's that jerk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rope swings, and this guy spends his turn getting up onto the side of the boat there and that's his turn. Next, this wyvern here is going to swoop down. As it does, its rider leaps off, landing right there. The wyvern comes over here and is going to make attacks on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes down and bites at you with its giant toothy maw. That's going to be a 25 to hit with its bite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fudge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 13 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not going to use its claws, because instead, as it brings its claws up in a rearing position, its tail whips underneath it with this gnarled pointed stinger at you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At me still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're the one that shot an exploding arrow at its friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be-- that's a 20 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so my armor class is 19 but I'm wearing a plus two Ring of Protection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but that's with your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that with the plus two ring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's with the plus two, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it hits me then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that little dance, looks quite nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, for that... You take ten points of piercing damage, and I need you to make a DC 15 constitution saving throw, as the stinger at the end of its tail pierces you in the side of your torso. And as it does you can feel the venom pulse in the inside of your skin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I have to beat 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got this!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Confidently. Roll that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No? As the poison pulses through your system you feel your muscles seize up with this horrible, painful, burning sensation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (exaggerated pain noises)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Buffy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take... 26 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy fudge, dude!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much? 26?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ouch. Ouchies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got to start doing math now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And pulls out two arrows at once, pulls back and (tssk) releases them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One is going for you, Keyleth. The other is going for Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These guys got skills.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 22 versus you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 20 versus Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket takes five points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay okay okay... okay...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their turn. All right, brings it to Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go Percy, go Percy, go!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far away am I from that wyvern that's currently attacking everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here, so you're about-- roughly 45 feet from him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Shave and a haircut.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This will be funny. Okay, I'm going to back up and sit down against the back wall of the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Against the doorway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull out the biggest gun I have. So, I'm going to pull out Bad News.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Fuck yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit down. I'm going to take aim and I'm going to do-- I'm going to spend a Grit, and try and take a wing shot at this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this wyvern here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's a wing shot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we'll see if it works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trying to shoot the wing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm shooting him in the wing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds awesome. Oh. You mean literally. Right. Sure. Yeah. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just winged him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. 19, 20-- Really? Where's my d12s, I was not prepared for this. Here we go. 14 points of damage, and he has to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just letting that guard die, right? We're not going to try to...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't realize we could save him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Fails that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That wyvern drops hard, 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It blows a big old hole in the side of its leathery wing. As you do, the impact sends its wing arm crumbling behind it. It spins uncontrollably in the space and then plummets to the ground, on its back, just reaching and scrambling trying to get back up. So it's currently prone on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boom! All right, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Deal with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I reload.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! I'll take a few steps towards the action and I'll cast (sings) Bigby's Hand, Bigby's Hand, you know it, shamone. On the griffon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he above the boat or just above the ocean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently above the ocean, just near the edge of the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think I can... twist?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop it!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, you could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going to dump him over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a check with your bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and this is all through the Hand Cone of Clarity. Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, right. So go ahead and roll and add five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19 plus five, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rider immediately plummets, falls right towards the edge of the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hits the railing. Breaks his back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes an acrobatics check and manages to reduce the damage and land on its feet, however it does still take nine points of falling damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he a halfling as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From best you can tell, just from the physicality.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With just a-- just for her archery skills.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you get a d10 inspiration dice for it, for your use.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends your turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, how long is the ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The full length of it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Show him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just so you know what I'm looking at right now, I'll show you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) This ship?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This ship right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This ship right here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. That one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it'd be about 130 feet in-- or 140 feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so would you say, maybe this area would be about like 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 foot radius, you mean?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, how-- where would--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 60 foot radius for you would be... right here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like this around you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can move.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to reach down-- stay where I am-- and touch the floor of the ship, and cast Hallow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hallow? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am so hard right now. I mean, Scanlan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which basically infuses a 60 foot radius with holy power, and any creatures or anything can't harm anything inside the radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. It takes-- look at the casting time on the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 hours.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scratch that! Okay, so here's what we're going to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24 hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hours. Hallow works, you take 24 hours and that land, where you do that, is like that until someone dispels it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should have done it when we first got on the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like with Hermione and her protection spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. That's good to know. Would have been cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instead?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Instead, I'm going to Guiding Bolt this guy right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No wait. The flying guy right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You currently can't see him, unfortunately. That is down below the ship because it swooped down to pick up the guy who had fallen, so he is currently out of your view.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Guiding Bolt the griffon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Cool. I'll Guiding Bolt-- I can't do that griffon up there, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Guiding Bolt? Might be able to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 120 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can get him from there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, okay. I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20, add that bonus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, man, that's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So in your confusion, you reach back to shoot the wyvern that's on the other side of the ship. It's not there, and so while the spell is releasing itself, you're like, "Crap! That one!" And by the time you turn around to redirect the divine energy blast, it arcs off in a random direction.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have a bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I still move, if I use my Sprinter's Boots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can still move. You haven't moved yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Sprinter's Boots over to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sprinter's Boots. Sprinter's Boots!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Sprinter's Boots, you can get there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm going to give her a Superior Healing Potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You haven't used it yet, but you have one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I can't give it to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has it. You handed it to her, but she hasn't--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here's a Superior Healing Potion!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't have one! Thanks, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A potion turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll wait and do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Top of the round.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so she has to use that on her turn, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. That's okay!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's move on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! You know what I'm going to do? I'm going to use a Superior Healing Potion, which is how many-- what do I roll for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Superior Healing Potion? That is-- wow, 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a big old heal. She's drinking a potion that Pike just gave her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were you hurt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uh-huh, actually very severely.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just healed her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of adding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but first I'm going to-- he's on the ground, so if I step away from him he doesn't get a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, he is not threatening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to move away from that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can move around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm going to stand next to Grog and hope he overshadows me. And I'm going to Lightning Arrow the griffon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Go ahead and roll for attack on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do I feel like a griffon will be immune to lightning attack?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, it's birds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're fine, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Birds hate lightning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The griffon is grappled, too. Well, not grappled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Birds hate lightning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is 4d8. Oh, I have to roll to see if I hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for the attack, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, which one looks like a Lightning Arrow? This, the amethyst, looks like a lightning one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's good, that's 25?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so now it's 4d8. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slams into the side of the griffon with a blast of energy and electricity surge through its body. The griffon loses about ten feet of height before it catches itself. You can see this giant burn mark on the side of its body. It's having a hard time keeping itself in the air. It's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my second attack, I'm going to have Trinket charge the elf girl in red.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shoot his wing off!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you fire an arrow, Trinket turns around and comes forward. Go ahead and roll an attack for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know if I've ever attacked with Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have before, it's been a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's been a really long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like possibly Pathfinder a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's been a while.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yay, Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he rolled a one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With inspiration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With inspiration-- no, it's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A one is an auto-miss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a frickin' one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Trinket goes to attack, the wyvern's on the ground, it's screeching around, moving its body, its tail whips out and strikes Trinket in the side of the armor, almost piercing it with the poisonous stinger. Trinket instinctively--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I forgot I was poisoned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's okay. It ricochets off the armor, but Trinket instinctively recoils from it and foregoes the attack to take a defensive stance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not doing well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I forgot I was poisoned! Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These weapons set up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to finish the healing potion just for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends his turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This guy's still alive in the back, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you just can't see him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. We can't see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to run up alongside Trinket on the side and stab the grounded wyvern two or three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you have your boots of haste, so you can do this, because you have to go up the stairs here to get to the next level. Right there. All right, so now you're up on the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use keen dagger to start, gets a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's 11 points of damage plus the Sneak Attack damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this is going to be nasty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leave some for Grog!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13 Sneak Attack damage, so that's 11 plus 13, first dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, 24 damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second dagger gets a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits. That is a ten of damage and the third dagger gets a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It does, it does? Very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Jersey, roll that shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Jersey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically all these attacks-- the creature is prone so you have advantage on these attacks too, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well. Did they all hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Go ahead and roll a second one for this last one just on the off-chance it might critical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so then you're fine, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I throw two more? Okay, I'm good with everything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So damage on the last one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it was... eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight, got you. All right, so as you rush around Trinket, you come up with your daggers, stab-stab-stab, you're jamming it in the side and you can see the dark black dragon blood spilling out of each wound as you're piercing it, it's screeching out and trying to get back to its feet in the process, but you just keep finding each opening and jamming in with your blades.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as a bonus action I want to take my hand under Trinket's ears and go, wooga-wooga-wooga-wooga.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Trinket goes (bear noises) and rubs into them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you mind healing him? He's low on health.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Such a glass half empty girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to swoop down towards Keyleth. It's going to attempt to grapple you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, Hey friend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make either an acrobatics or athletics check, your choice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do athletics. Oh. It's okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? The griffon reaches down, (ksh ksh) grapples into you with each of its talons and lifts up, carrying you and it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay guys, I'll be fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- shoves you off the side. You begin to plummet off the side of the ship, you see it vanish above you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'll be fine, she'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be fine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, Keyleth, it's what you wanted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius and Grog.

That's the end of its turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rap video.
