lines.text: Don't need validation. Save it for Orion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I just wanted to bring it up again. I just wanted to bring it up again, because I think it's the most ridiculous death to a wyvern ever.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Death by bunny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This wyvern, looking at the circumstance, takes off. Tries to fly and can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it can't fly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because its wing is messed up from Tiberius, so it steps around to the only thing it can reach, which is you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coming at you with a bite and its stinger again, because it can't use its claws. That is a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I sing my little Cutting Words song to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, against which attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against which attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he has two attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a bite and a stinger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against the stinger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bite is a 22 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 14 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its entire mouth just opens up and clamps down onto your shoulder and torso. As it's holding you in place, you try and pull back as its tail whips towards you. Go ahead and make your roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d10, and that's whatever the attack is reduced by.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's d10. Yes! That's ten!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zero?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten, okay. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So it rolled a 24 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That goes down to 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My armor class is 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, amazing!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Your armor class is 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm also wearing a necklace which makes it 17.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your armor class is 17.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Your armor class is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, snap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm okay. From that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you write that down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well I wrote the armor and then there was apparently some necklace that I forgot about.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, he's had a plus two and the armor, plus three to his AC, which was 14, so that's 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amulet of Natural Armor, I didn't realize. I can give it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I don't feel bad about taking the ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, fair enough. So, as it's clamping down on you, its tail whips in the air-- what words are you going to throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) And you miss me like the deserts miss the rain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wyvern, who is still clamped down on your body, its one eye opens up and goes, you hear an audible (hruh?). And as its tail swings towards you, it just hits the ground next to you, slamming into the wood. Entirely distracted by your sudden lack of fear and display of beautiful musical voice. Misses you. That ends its turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to turn towards it, and just unload.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shoot that load, Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Finish it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unleash that load.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Damn it, I wasn't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? Total ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Total ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the closer, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. You only get two attacks, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm using my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you mean you're using your action surge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Using my action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you get four attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That misses. And then 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's two hits. I was also using my sharpshooter mode for that so that I can do some extra damage, and that's... Number one, that's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill all the things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 points of damage plus one point of ice damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the ice damage that's going to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the next one is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, cold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, it's a little chilly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 points of damage and one point of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The closer!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The closer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Western-style, I'm just going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fan the fucking hammer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to fan the hammer, I'm going to just tear that wing off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with each successive blast, even the ones that don't immediately impact, the first blast hits and explodes across its shoulder joint, as you see the rest of the flesh that Tiberius had already weakened gets severed entirely, the wing flung off the side of the ship and disappearing in the wind beneath. As it rears back in pain, the second one hits its side, the third one strikes it on the other wing, and as it rears back in pain, its mouth open to the sky in this screeching death-rattle, the final blast hits it under the chin, leaving a gaping hole under its neck as it steps back and then tumbles off the edge of the ship, vanishing below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Attacked the wrong ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait wait wait. Can I catch it as an air elemental and bring it back up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are under the ship currently, you see the wyvern (whoosh) below. You dive for it. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh look, everyone, we still have one to interrogate. Isn't that nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try to grab it, but your air form doesn't have quite, and it just swoops through--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm an air elemental, shit shit shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and disappears towards the ocean below.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Forgot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the captain gets up, the other halfling, which you can see is dressed in ragged robes, and has cloth wrapped across its face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull the arrow so it wraps up in the rope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards are there with their weapons drawn. You can-- currently there is still the spear that's jammed in the side that's sparking, causing the whole ship to list.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try and get that out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as you swing up you go ahead and manage to, as your air elemental form, pull the strange thing off the edge of the ship, at which point the blue stone comes back online and the ship rights itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was cracked or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to check on that box. Now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that other wyvern was gone for a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go check, you interrogate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We haven't seen any of them come out of that room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they were clever, they didn't leave the room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If these are, like he said, a distraction...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run down and check the box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This halfling is currently on the side right now, the one guard holding it. Who's going downstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'll go to the halfling.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Liam, where are you at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's in New Jersey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Last time I spoke, I was by Keyleth. I'm just following her lead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you okay health-wise?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm all right. Been better, I've been worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you went over to the halfling. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to pick him up, not chuck him, but pick him up and hold him ever-so-gently over the side and say, My, my, it does seem like a long way down. What the fuck are you doing attacking this ship?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he says that, I hover the daggers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll an intimidation check with advantage because of Tiberius's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, if you fail I can intimidate him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a beard today? He definitely has a beard today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On both rolls?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 on the advantage roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, got you, okay. All right, so the halfling, which you now look, appears to be female. The cloth drops from its face. You can see the teeth are broken and rotted. This is not a city-going folk. "Please, please don't, just let me live. Let me live."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let you live? Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Guh! Stop it, stop it!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was such a hard battle, I'm shaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starts crying in your grasp.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If you wish to live, answer our giant friend who asked you a rather polite question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What was the question again?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, my hands are so sweaty, I'm afraid you'll slip if you don't tell me what you were doing attacking this ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We live in an island below. We usually just hit ships that come through this channel, this "pass. Pirating, if you will. Take money, things that we can, and run. Usually it's just quick hits "and go. We couldn't pass up the opportunity. We managed to acquire a few things to help, and we've "only harried one other skyship. Once we saw you, we knew there had to be some sort of riches "involved."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Extremely scared, extremely honest, in a mode of trying to stay alive at this point in time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So nobody hired you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, haven't been to a city in years. I told you, we have an island below, it's a cavern "we live in. We just come up and out to grab what we can to survive."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain Damon, what do you propose we do with this thief-pirate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Captain Damon, who's gone back to the ship to try and get it back on course, is currently turning it around. "To be perfectly honest, I usually throw them overboard. But if you see--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drop!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want him, you can catch him. Her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? The captain said he'd throw him over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, I still have the grapple arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. As the rope's going (unraveling rope)--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm still holding on still, so she's dangling? Can I catch her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, yes. As you look over-- actually, let me--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have an arrow through her arm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. In a very painful way she is currently held by her shoulder blade, which now has--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it was wrapped around her, so maybe it didn't hurt quite as bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hurt pretty bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull her up. I look at Grog. Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What he's thinking, I'm doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? I pull her up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull her up. She's bleeding out and is looking pretty rough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, maybe we should've let her drop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really? I pick her up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put her back down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, should we put her in a prison cell? I don't know what to do with her now that we have her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heal her and put her to work. She's probably been out of work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think, little one? You want a real job, maybe brush your teeth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can replace the guard that they killed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's on one knee, going, "Anything."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anything. Just don't drop me." Looking over at Grog again. "Don't drop me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be afraid of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't drop me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be very afraid. Pike, do you want to heal her?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well. Come here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are we in agreement, we are saving this one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go through her pockets, make sure she's not hiding any weapons to attack us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, we did lose one over the edge, so we might need another crew member.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, what's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Teera."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teera.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Teera. How old are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's so sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks in her maybe twenties or thirties? Up close you can see, just a harsh life in the harsh elements. She looks older than she is, but there's a youthfulness to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her breath is really really bad, maybe you can heal her teeth while you're at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Teera, empty your pockets. I give her a quick pat-down to make sure she's not carrying any daggers or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few rusty hidden blades and a coin purse that contains four gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can earn your wage on this ship, if you behave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you don't. (falling sound)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He means he'll throw you overboard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can have a real life here, little one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's your past. This is your future.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she slinks over towards the doorways that lead into the lower part of the deck. As you guys lead Teera in, the captain has regained control of the ship, and you guys head in to check in on the room where the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm knocking on the door. "All right? Desona?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Kima?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lady Kima? Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door opens and they're still sitting in the back by the box with their weapons at the ready and Kima looks at the door. "Is everything all right?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, pirates. We've taken care of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good." And she's rubbing her head. You can see there's a little trickle of blood on her head, apparently when the ship listed, they all slipped in the room as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she hurt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you need anything, is everything all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, it's fine." She reaches up and touches her head, you can see there's a slight warm glow of divine energy and the blood flow stops.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Almost feels like cheating. Okay. As long as everything is fine, there was no incidents, nothing unusual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing, nothing, I've kept a very close watch."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent. I'll report upstairs, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Carry on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Really, the box is fine? For sure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody seemed fine, they said no events, nothing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This fricking gnat in this fricking room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it was trolling over here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we do insight? I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guards in a room, I mean really.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, all right, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My insight was the box was still there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Prestidigitation on the little halfling and clean her up real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As she's going inside, she watches her form--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It feels like little fishes, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sounds tickled and scared at the same time. But the clothing cleans up. It's still tattered, and she looks a little cleaner. Most of the dirt's gone, but she still looks weathered, her skin's darker from a lot of sun.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was mainly working on the smell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A proper bath will be better, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she healed? Did you heal her?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, I did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop the elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No longer a tornado.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say as you guys all head back underneath the ship to go ahead and right yourselves for the remainder of the journey, we'll call the game for the evening there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great map, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That shit looks awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it's so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys handled that pretty damn well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is way better than E3.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's definitely trying to kill us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only one of us got thrown off the ship, and she could fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! It was nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they had no idea you were a druid. You were the closest one to the griffons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm okay, I'm okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Normally that's me, just right off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [end of game]
